content: take on winter in style with this cute crochet hat that features a fancy shell design created in red heart super saver ombre double_crochet single_crochet and shell stitches are easy to memorize on this project pattern is accentuated by gentle tones of the ombre yarn and you can easily replicate the effect using any shade you like make the matching scarf for a perfect gift https //www yarnspirations com/red-heart-crochet-shell-stitch-basic-scarf/rhc0125-030222m html
